rules.rule_text: If the living room temperature is hot and humidity is high, turn on the air conditioner and set it to cooling mode at 22 degrees

metadata.description: Activates AC when conditions are uncomfortably hot and humid

rules.rule_text: If the living room temperature is warm and humidity is comfortable, no action is needed

metadata.description: Prevents unnecessary AC activation when conditions are acceptable

rules.rule_text: When motion is detected in the hallway and the light level is dark, turn on the hallway light

metadata.description: Automatic lighting for safety when someone walks through dark hallway

rules.rule_text: When motion is detected in the living room and the light level is dim, turn on the living room light and set brightness to 70 percent

metadata.description: Comfortable lighting when someone enters a dim room

rules.rule_text: If the bedroom temperature is cold, turn on the bedroom heater and set temperature to 21 degrees

metadata.description: Maintains comfortable sleeping temperature in bedroom

rules.rule_text: If the office temperature is cold, turn on the office heater and set temperature to 22 degrees

metadata.description: Maintains comfortable working temperature in office

rules.rule_text: When the living room light level is very bright, close the living room blinds to 50 percent position

metadata.description: Reduces glare by partially closing blinds when sunlight is intense

rules.rule_text: When the living room light level is dark and no motion is detected, open the living room blinds fully

metadata.description: Maximizes natural light when room is unoccupied and dark

rules.rule_text: If no motion is detected in the living room for a while and the light is on, turn off the living room light to save energy

metadata.description: Energy saving by turning off lights in unoccupied rooms

rules.rule_text: If the living room temperature is comfortable and humidity is comfortable, no action is needed as conditions are optimal

metadata.description: Confirms optimal conditions require no intervention
